key.name: window-state
key.summary: The saved state of the window
key.description: The saved state of the window (maximized, normal)

key.name: window-width
key.description: Saves the window width for later restoration.

key.name: window-height
key.description: Saves the window height for later restoration.

key.name: opening-x
key.description: Saves the window’s X position for later restoration.

key.name: opening-y
key.description: Saves the window’s Y position for later restoration.

key.name: notification-x
key.summary: X position of the intrusive notification window
key.description: Saves the intrudive notification's X position for later restoration.

key.name: notification-y
key.summary: Y position of the intrusive notification window
key.description: Saves the intrudive notification's Y position for later restoration.

key.name: db-dir
key.description: Directory where the database file is stored. By default it's the user_data_dir, but can be configured to be anything (for instance, to synchronize via Dropbox).

key.name: ask-delete
key.summary: Ask for confirmation before deleting an event
key.description: Show a dialog for every task deletion, that asks user to confirm such a deletion.

key.name: early-notifications
key.description: Allow some slack for the user by showing a notification earlier than the actual event.

key.name: intrusive-notifications
key.description: Show a top level window that needs to be clicked (i.e., clear or snooze) instead of a libnotify event.

key.name: play-sound
key.description: Play a sound when a notification is shown.

key.name: hide-on-close
key.summary: Hide instead of exit when closing
key.description: When pressing the close button, hide the application instead of closing it.

key.name: show-inverse
key.description: Show the task thead inverted, starting from old and coming down to new tasks.

key.name: gsync
key.description: Allow Enoté to synchronize with GMail's Tasks.

key.name: user-name
key.description: Username for Authentication with Google services.

key.name: session-key
key.description: Session key used for logging in Google

key.name: access-token
key.description: The token used to authenticate users.

key.name: refresh-token
key.description: Not sure what this is.

key.name: expires-in
key.description: When token expires.

key.name: issued
key.description: When token was issued.
